summary: A tragic and comic tale about beautiful and self-absorbed Eva, who cheats on her boyfriend, which becomes the starting point of a slow but relentless descent down to the life of ordinary people and a surprising, but doomed friendship.
cast: Michelle Meadows|Michael Segerström|Richard Ulfsäter|Michael Lindgren|Marko Ivkovich|Erica Silfverhielm|Henrik Lundström|Tanja Lorentzon|Robin Keller|Johan Hallström|Erik Johansson|Malin Benno|Lis Nilheim|Elisabeth von Gerber|Martin Svane|Göran von Euler|Christina von Knorring|Jenny Cassel|Lars Engblom|Caroline Ferber|Lina Fridlund|Marita Gidlund|Messiah Hallberg|Erik Hoffman-Bang|Joakim Lundberg|Catta Neuding|Philip Paradi|Nathalie Sanneman|Martin Sundberg Ståhl|Kristina Thilén|Sara Ulvenstrand|Johanna Walström|Patrik Edgren|Johan Matton
title: Darling
